name: Tiramisu French Toasts
recipeIngredient: 1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple syrup
1/3 cup warm water or almond milk (Or half coconut milk, half water)
1-2 teaspoons instant cofee or strong brewed coffee
1-2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil
1/2 teaspoon lemon juice or a few drops of vinegar
Sprinkle shaved chocolate or Cocoa powder (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix 1.5 Tablespoons finely ground Oats, 1 Tablespoon finely ground flax seed, 1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple syrup, 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/3+ cup warm water or almond milk (Or half coconut milk, half water), 1 Tablespoons cocoa powder, 1-2 teaspoons instant cofee or strong brewed coffee. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes. Mix again, dip slices and pan fry them on medium-low, in 1-2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil. 3-4 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix 1.5 Tablespoons finely ground Oats, 1 Tablespoon finely ground flax seed, 1 Tablespoon raw sugar or maple syrup, 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/3+ cup warm water or almond milk (Or half coconut milk, half water), 1 Tablespoons cocoa powder, 1-2 teaspoons instant cofee or strong brewed coffee. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes. Mix again, dip slices and pan fry them on medium-low, in 1-2 teaspoons organic canola or coconut oil. 3-4 minutes each side.

itemListElement.text: Mix 3-4 Tablespoons ground cashew or almond with 4-5 Tablespoons coconut milk to get preferred consistency. Add a Tablespoon sugar, 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice or a few drops of vinegar. Mix, taste, adjust and keep ready.
itemListElement.name: Mix 3-4 Tablespoons ground cashew or almond with 4-5 Tablespoons coconut milk to get preferred consistency. Add a Tablespoon sugar, 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice or a few drops of vinegar. Mix, taste, adjust and keep ready.

itemListElement.text: Or add a little coconut milk and raw sugar to vegan cream cheese to make a spreadable cream.
itemListElement.name: Or add a little coconut milk and raw sugar to vegan cream cheese to make a spreadable cream.

itemListElement.text: Add a teaspoon of instant coffee and optional liquor like coffee liqueur, rum or kahlua, or liquerr extract, to 2-3 Tablespoons warm maple. Brush the maple on the french toasts.
itemListElement.name: Add a teaspoon of instant coffee and optional liquor like coffee liqueur, rum or kahlua, or liquerr extract, to 2-3 Tablespoons warm maple. Brush the maple on the french toasts.

itemListElement.text: Then top with the cream mixture.
itemListElement.name: Then top with the cream mixture.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle shaved chocolate or Cocoa powder through a sieve/strainer.
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle shaved chocolate or Cocoa powder through a sieve/strainer.

keywords: dessert french toasts, vegan breakfast, vegan french toasts
